name: A.I Test: Top-Down
description:
This is a simple test for AI in top-down games. This game is receiving updates, like bug-fixes, new content, etc.

In the near future, you will be able to donate to me if you want to. Half of the game's revenue will go to mom, 4/10 of it to me, and 1/10 of it to my older brother, who made the game.

Credits

CreeperExplodeMakesGames: The person who owns the game, which is me.

My older brother: The developer of the game, even though I own the game.

Unity: The engine used to make this game.

Romi Fauzi: Made a tutorial for 2D NavMesh. Watch his video;

NavMesh Plus: He used this in the game. Get it here: https://github.com/h8man/NavMeshPlus

Skelly1983: Helped somebody on Unity Answers on the TextMeshPro namespace in scripts

Pixilart: The website that the graphics were made in.

Also, my older brother used the scripts of the open source of Baldi's Basics 1.3.2 (You can get it at https://gamebanana.com/tools/6677) as reference for coding the game.

Controls:

Period: Increasing the time scale

Comma: Decreasing the time scale

R: Reloading the scene. (Not in 1.0)

N: Going from the first to second scene (1.0.6)

P: Going from the second to first scene (1.0.6)

You can mod this game! It's best to only include the modified files in your mod download.

Also, if you want to make a fan-decompile of this game, the game's version is 2022.1.8f1.

This game was completed within 1 day.

I hope you enjoy this game!
